first.content: Well go for a try! Fairly simple just stuff everything in a flat piece of chicken, roll it and baked it, done
first.name: Erebus

last.content: Well yes ud def have to marinate that piece of chic for a while basically just with garlic and onion and soysauce depends on what flavour u like mate~ pick a chicken breast of u feel like to have something healthier
last.name: Erebus
